dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6160 IH: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize a lifespan respite care program.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Molinaro (for himself and Mr. Cárdenas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize a lifespan respite care program.

section.header: Reauthorization of lifespan respite care program
section.text: Section 2905 of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 300ii–4) is amended by striking fiscal years 2020 through fiscal year 2024 and inserting fiscal years 2024 through 2028.
